abstract: NBA Roundup; Detroit Pistons beat Toronto Raptors, 108-104; other basketball scores noted.
lead_paragraph: Reggie Jackson and Kentavious Caldwell-Pope combined for 54 points, 13 assists and 11 rebounds without committing a turnover as Detroit beat Toronto.

headline.main: Pistons Hold Off Raptors Down Stretch
headline.print_headline: Pistons Hold Off Raptors Down Stretch; Thunder Win Their Fourth Straight

snippet: Reggie Jackson and Kentavious Caldwell-Pope combined for 54 points, 13 assists and 11 rebounds without committing a turnover as Detroit beat Toronto.
